#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
#include<vector>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<algorithm>
#include<list>
#include<cstring>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define vi vector<int>
#define vii vector<vi >
#define pp pair<int,int>
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define ppl pair<ll,ll>
#define vl vector<ll>
#define vll vector<vl >
#define vb vector<bool>
#define llu unsigned ll
#define all(c) c.begin(),c.end()
#define mod 1000000007
#define sc scanf
#define pf printf
ll power(ll a,ll b)
{
	if(!b)
		return 1;
	if(b==1)
		return a;
	ll temp=power(a,b/2);
	temp=(temp*temp);
	if(b&1)
		temp=(temp*a);
	return temp;
}
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int i, t, n, ans, num1, num2,val;
	cin >> t;
	while( t--)
	{
		cin >> n;
		//  distinct = 23*60 + 59 = 1439
		vi v(1440);
		ans = 0;
		for( i=0;i<n;i++ )
		{
			cin >> num1 >> num2;
			val = num1*60 + num2;
			v[val]++;
		}
		for( i=0;i<1440;i++ )
		{
			ans = max( ans,v[i]);
		}
		cout << ans << "\n";
	}
	//cin >> n;
    return 0;
}
